venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description:
Just added another hsppy hour show at The Bear and Grill! 

For anyone who is new to Party Express - or just haven't been paying attention - I (Tom “The Captain” Ferrara) am a Party Express! member. I play a classic selection of acoustic rock that includes everyone from James Taylor and The Beatles to Green Day and Collective Soul. 

 I've performed a numebr of happy hours, open mic nights and private partied from the living room to the patio to the beach. I've also played a wine-tasting benefit for The Estuary Council in Old Saybrook and headlined Sunday afternoon at this year's Old Saybrook Arts and Crafts Festival. 

I am back at the B&G on Friday evening, November 4th starting at 5:30 PM. 

 Happy hour on Friday is a great way to start your weekend. Come and join your friends from Party Express to unwind, catch up and ease into your weekend. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier!

The Bear & Grill has great food, plenty of parking and offers the following Happy Hour food and drink specials: 
     ** $4 22oz Draft Beer    ** $4 Martinis 
     ** $2.50 Bud lite, Miller lite, Coors lite 
     ** 1/2 price Appetizers

 

 

P.S. – I can't say too often  how much I appreciate the continued support adn encouragement that I receive from the members of PartyExpres and other MeetUp groups. Thank you.    -Tom
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Tom "The Captain" just added another happy hour show!!!
